ch0073_09_karate/2701_0701_02_10:
Look! We have a building to ward off rain and
wind! And heating and air conditioning to protect
us from the cold and heat of the outdoors!
ch0073_09_karate/2701_0701_03_10: I could train nonstop forever in here!
ch0073_09_karate/2701_0701_04_10:
Or...so I thought. It’s actually SO comfortable that
I can’t bring myself to train very much.
